name: burn-data-predictor
description: A deep learning template for predicting numerical values using the Burn framework
author: Ferrisup Team
next_steps: 📊 Train on the included housing dataset: cd {{project_name}} && cargo run -- train --housing
🧠 Evaluate the model: cargo run -- evaluate --housing
🔍 Predict a value: cargo run -- predict --features "2000,3,2,15,8"
📈 Predict values from a CSV: cargo run -- predict-csv --file your_data.csv
📚 Learn more: Read CUSTOMIZATION.md for detailed customization options
